Question: Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd.

Product: Mini PC

- Specialized in mini PC, industry application terminals, and IOT system solutions
- Recognized by AMD and Intel as a core partner solution provider
- 80 R&D engineers dedicated to innovating and producing high-quality products
- Focuses on providing high-quality solutions, products, and services worldwide
- Aims to be the best innovator, producer, and supplier of mini PC
- Committed to providing customers with high-quality after-sales experience and listening to constructive feedback
Summary_cn:
深圳美高电子设备有限公司。

产品：迷你电脑

- 专注于迷你电脑、工业应用终端和物联网系统解决方案
- 被AMD和Intel认可为核心合作伙伴解决方案提供商
- 80名研发工程师致力于创新和生产高质量的产品
- 专注于向全球提供高质量的解决方案、产品和服务
- 旨在成为迷你电脑领域最佳的创新者、生产商和供应商
- 致力于为客户提供高质量的售后体验并倾听建设性反馈
